## utils.getVerificationMethodTypes() function

Retrieves DID verification method types from a given DID document.

Note: The DID document must adhere to the W3C DID specification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getVerificationMethodTypes(options: {
    didDocument: Record<string, any>;
}): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { didDocument: Record&lt;string, any&gt;; } | An object containing input parameters for retrieving types. |

**Returns:**

string\[\]

An array of types. If no types were found, an empty array is returned.
